item.title: YouTube Shorts Idea Man/Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a creative and skilled YouTube Shorts Idea Man/Editor to create captivating 20-40 second videos. As an Idea Man/Editor, you will be responsible for conceptualizing unique and engaging video concepts, as well as editing and finalizing the videos to ensure high-quality output. This role requires a strong understanding of YouTube Shorts trends and the ability to create content that resonates with the target audience. The ideal candidate should have a keen eye for detail, excellent storytelling skills, and proficiency in video editing software.   

Skills needed:
- Video editing
- Storytelling
- Creativity
- Knowledge of YouTube Shorts trends
- Attention to detail

This is a medium-sized project that will last for approximately 1 to 3 months. We are looking for an intermediate-level professional who can bring fresh and innovative ideas to the table.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 14:08 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Production, Video Editing, Videography, Video Post-Editing, Creative Writing
Skills: Video Production, Video Editing, Videography, Video Post-Editing, Creative Writing
Country: United States

item.title: Ad Short Video (Insta & Tiktok) Using Existing Content - Upwork
item.description:
Hi we're an aussie ecommerce brand selling beauty products. We're looking for a video editor for our ads on Instagram and Tiktok. We need someone that can edit our prexisting videos into a nice reels and tiktok format in multiple different styles.

This initial job will see how we work together. We're looking for a video made using our content that we will run as a shorts ad on fb/insta reels.

If this is you please provide:
- Your portfolio
- A bit about yourself
- Bonus if you understand the difference between paid and organic shorts

If this initial job works well we will likely work with the same person for future videos.

Budget: $30

item.title: Looking for voiceover for youtube channel (Videos about youtubers with a documentary style) - Upwork
item.description:
I´m looking for a voiceover for my youtube team that wants long term business with a brand new youtube channel. It is CRITICAL that you know how to keep the audience`s retention using your voice.

The videos is about youtubers with a documentary style and will be around 1500-1700 words ( 8 mins of video minimum), so its a BIG plus if you are interested in the topic.

It is also VITAL that you keep your deadlines. That is super important!

I would need 1 voiceover every week and I am planning on scaling it eventually. Within the next year I´m planning on having multiple channels. (I already have one now thats making a little money) Its really important that you are fluent in english!

After the channel is starting to make money (it´s already monetized), the freelancers who works with me will get bonuses etc if we do good work.

The budget per video is $10


This is the kind of videos I would want to make:

https://www.youtube.com/@baseballyak/videos
https://www.youtube.com/@BottomoftheInning/videos


Looking forward to hearing from you and you MUST provide samples to be considered.

Budget: $10
Posted On: July 01, 2024 13:52 UTC
Category: Voice Talent
Skills:Voice-Over, Voice Acting
Skills: Voice-Over, Voice Acting
Country: Norway

item.title: Full Youtube Automation Team FOr NAVY/MILITAIRY Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for a professional and experienced team to handle the full video creation process, producing high-quality YouTube content/videos that are around 8+ minutes long and in the navy/militairy niche..

Before applying, please read the following carefully: The team should consist of a scriptwriter, a REAL voiceover actor (male from the USA, UK, or Canada) and a video editor.

The ideal candidate/team will have worked on successful YouTube automation channels before in the same niche, have extensive knowledge of YouTube guidelines, copyright rules, fair use policies, and have strong editing skills.

They should also have access to stock footage sites and experience using VidIQ or TubeBuddy. The videos must be able to be monetized.
We will provide the idea/topic, along with some preliminary research/angles/samples, and the team would create the content/video around it. Intro/end screen/subscribe pop-up templates will be included.
The video workflow should include a 10-second bait intro, channel intro, follow IG/subscribe pop-ups, and then the content in the body should be edited in a way that is funny, engaging, and entertaining, ending with a channel end screen.

This includes:
- Writing an original, well-researched script with an entertaining style and a 10-second hook. - The script must be factually accurate, plagiarism-free, and pass Copyscape 100%.
- Performing a voiceover (NO AI voiceover) in an excited, engaging, and energetic tone.
- Mixing/mastering/syncing the audio to the video, editing out pauses and breaths.
- Adding in copyright-free sound effects/background music where applicable, but not in excess.
- Sourcing and using copyright-free clips and having access to licensed clips.
- Editing the video in a bingeable style that is captivating to the audience, with a focus on CTR and retention rate. The video should be 1080p HD+ and make use of lower-thirds/text/transitions where applicable. Only professional video editing software should be used, such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Davinci Resolve, or Final Cut Pro.
- All in fluent English.

The team must have:
- Experience producing bingeable content for YouTube.
- An understanding of how to keep viewers engaged with good pacing, transitions, etc.
- Entertain, motivate and inspire the audience.
- A commitment to high quality without the need for many revisions.
- Good organization, communication, and fast turnaround times.

Priority will be given to the team that best matches the job description. The budget is $80 per video without thumbnails, but negotiable for higher pay for proven work of high quality and a results-based track record.

Are you interested please let us know and send a current portfolio/sample work for review and start your reply with ‘i read everything’.





Budget: $80
Posted On: July 01, 2024 13:36 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Elite Copywriter for Youtube Podcasts - Upwork
item.description:
ABOUT US:
We're a proven video podcast agency with a growing roster of clients who expect our copywriting to fit their brand voice and amplify the reach of their content.

We provide not only editing services but also copywriting, short-form video, and graphic design.

We're currently operating as an international team of 6 people from 5 different countries.

ABOUT THE ROLE:
You will be reviewing podcast recordings and crafting copy that conveys the essence of episodes in the most dynamic and appealing way possible.

You MUST be comfortable adapting your writing voice to fit multiple client's unique voices. You will be able to draw inspiration directly from the content of a client's podcast episode as well as their past work.

Our copywriters are directly involved in producing the following deliverables:
- Episode titles and 100-300 word episode descriptions
- Story-based emails based on episodes
- Captions for social media posts, using best practices for the platform (emojis, hashtags, etc.)
- Generating concepts and ideas for Youtube thumbnails and collaborate with graphic designers to deliver a high-click-through thumbnail that complements the title
- Blog posts (800-1500 words, using SEO best practices)
- Selecting select "teaser" clips for intros
- Pulling quotes from the episode to be turned into quote cards
- Collaborating with short-form video editors to select the most interesting content and confirm that it's edited in a way that's accurate and coherent

HOURS:
Some overlap with U.S. East Coast working hours may be required occasionally. For the most part, you will control your hours. However, deadlines must be met.

REQUIREMENTS:
- Proven experience as a copywriter, preferably within the podcasting or media industry
- Exceptional writing, editing, and proofreading skills. You take pride in accuracy and fairness and sweat the details!
- Strong understanding of SEO and content marketing principles. You think like a marketer, using psychological triggers (curiosity, fear, desire, etc.) to write copy that moves audiences to action
- EXCELLENT communication and collaboration skills
- Ability to work under tight deadlines and manage multiple projects simultaneously
- Familiar with American culture and American English slang and idioms
- Familiarity with podcasting platforms and trends is a plus

HIRING PROCESS:

STAGE 1: We vet the list of candidates based on profile, portfolio, and applicable experience

STAGE 2: Short-listed candidates complete a PAID test project.

STAGE 3: Video interview.

Hourly Range: $20.00-$25.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 13:35 UTC
Category: Marketing Copywriting
Skills:English, Content Marketing, Email Copywriting, Content Writing, Copywriting
Skills: English, Content Marketing, Email Copywriting, Content Writing, Copywriting
Country: United States
click to apply

You will be reviewing podcast recordings and crafting copy that conveys the essence of episodes in the most dynamic and appealing way possible.

You MUST be comfortable adapting your writing voice to fit multiple client's unique voices. You will be able to draw inspiration directly from the content of a client's podcast episode as well as their past work.

Our copywriters are directly involved in producing the following deliverables:
- Episode titles and 100-300 word episode descriptions
- Story-based emails based on episodes
- Captions for social media posts, using best practices for the platform (emojis, hashtags, etc.)
- Generating concepts and ideas for Youtube thumbnails and collaborate with graphic designers to deliver a high-click-through thumbnail that complements the title
- Blog posts (800-1500 words, using SEO best practices)
- Selecting select "teaser" clips for intros
- Pulling quotes from the episode to be turned into quote cards
- Collaborating with short-form video editors to select the most interesting content and confirm that it's edited in a way that's accurate and coherent

HOURS:
Some overlap with U.S. East Coast working hours may be required occasionally. For the most part, you will control your hours. However, deadlines must be met.

REQUIREMENTS:
- Proven experience as a copywriter, preferably within the podcasting or media industry
- Exceptional writing, editing, and proofreading skills. You take pride in accuracy and fairness and sweat the details!
- Strong understanding of SEO and content marketing principles. You think like a marketer, using psychological triggers (curiosity, fear, desire, etc.) to write copy that moves audiences to action
- EXCELLENT communication and collaboration skills
- Ability to work under tight deadlines and manage multiple projects simultaneously
- Familiar with American culture and American English slang and idioms
- Familiarity with podcasting platforms and trends is a plus

HIRING PROCESS:

STAGE 1: We vet the list of candidates based on profile, portfolio, and applicable experience

STAGE 2: Short-listed candidates complete a PAID test project.

STAGE 3: Video interview.

Hourly Range: $20.00-$25.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 13:35 UTC
Category: Marketing Copywriting
Skills:English, Content Marketing, Email Copywriting, Content Writing, Copywriting
Skills: English, Content Marketing, Email Copywriting, Content Writing, Copywriting
Country: United States

item.title: Instagram Reels Creation / Editing - Upwork
item.description:
Hello, I am looking for someone who can take a library of video content and turn them into Instagram reels. The style of content we're trying to create is like this person:

https://www.instagram.com/kevinqvdang?igsh=ZTMzeXc3d3JjNzly

Simple videos with titles/hooks that drive people to read the caption. If you can also write strong captions, this is a huge bonus and we'll pay you more. However, that has been hard to hire for.

This job requires you to:
- Find relevant hooks
- Edit videos from a library of content
- Source music for the reels
- Write captions (not required, but ideal)

Please send me examples of this exact type of content that you've created or you will not be considered. I need to know that you "get it"

Hourly Range: $12.00-$36.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 13:29 UTC
Category: Video Editing

Attention to detail and excellent listening skills are essential for this job.
